alert.note: Alert for Bowie; Cass (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 9:45PM CDT until June 13 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Miller County in southwestern Arkansas... Western Lafayette County in southwestern Arkansas... Northeastern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Bowie County in northeastern Texas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 945 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Redwater, or 10 miles southwest of Wake Village, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Texarkana, Wake Village, Nash, Redwater, Maud, Fouke, Garland, Genoa, Mount Pleasant, Domino, Gin City, Pleasant Hill, Spirit Lake and Fort Lynn. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
